recommendations: Rishabh Kataruka ‚ÄúAs I remember, Pratyush Devliyal was a very productive person. He is a passionate, dedicated and independent strategist, a person you can trust when you want to be sure that important tasks will be completed in a systematic and precise way. Always punctual and honest person with great interpersonal skills. His technical background and dedication makes Pratyush Devliyal to view solutions instead of problems.‚Äù

projects: [{"title":"Research Assistant, XLRI Jamshedpur","start_date":"Jul 2015","description":"ÔÇßConducting research about understanding sources of inspiration and motivation of BoP (Bottom of Pyramid) women to become entrepreneurÔÇßAnalyzing data trends presented by Jascolampf (http://www.jascolampf.com/) to understand nature of support/resources/opportunities for underprivileged backgrounds or lower income families with limited access to education/work/opportunities."},{"title":"Study of Free Vibration Characteristics of Clamped-Clamped Timoshenko Beam","start_date":"Nov 2014","description":"The present paper deals with the determination of the natural frequencies of vibration of Timoshenko beam with classical approach by Eigen Value Analysis. A generalized solution is used to achieve the exact values of the frequencies and corresponding modeshapes The methodology is based upon converting the set of coupled differential equation into Eigen-value problem which is then solved in the usual manner using techniques of Linear Algebra."},{},{},{}]

organizations.title: Jagriti Yatra
organizations.description: I was one of the 450 participants selected for 'Jagriti Yatra' 2015 from across the nation. Jagriti Yatra is a 15-day long, national train journey that takes the yatris 8000 kilometers across the length and breadth of India, to understand and build the India of smaller towns and villages through enterprise. 450 youngsters, selected from thousands of applicants, many from smaller towns and villages, join the Yatra every year, with the goal of creating awareness and start a movement of 'building India through enterprise'.
